entry.title: Dicey Dungeons v0.2.0b0
entry.content:
### Dicey Dungeons v0.2.0-beta
Warning: This release comes with many new options. Because of this, multiworlds generated using previous releases will probably not play well with the new client. I HIGHLY recommend waiting to upgrade to this release until all multiworlds generated have been played through.
Changes from v0.1.2.1-beta: - Option: Episode progression - Choose between 'vanilla' (like starting a new save file, later episodes are locked until earlier episodes are completed) and 'open_world' (relies on your Dicey Dungeons save, all episodes available from start) - Option: Floor 5 Shop Selection - Choose between 'vanilla' (floor 5 shops will have an upgrade, a heal, and an item, which might be a multiworld item) and 'items_only' (floor 5 shops will have 3 items, all of which may be multiworld items) - Option: Skip Cutscenes - Choose whether you want intro/outro cutscenes for episodes to be skipped - Option: Split dice - Choose if you'd like dice (gained from leveling up) to be locked behind receiving a certain number of Dice Shards first. Configurable both in required numbers of dice shards per die, and number of spare dice shards added to the pool, for safety - Flavor: Revamped filler items - There are now multiple filler items, all inspired by fighters in game (e.g. Rotten Apple's Pet Worm) - Graphics: A new title screen, featuring an Archipelago logo created using the Characters from the game (inspired by krunk on Discord) will now appear instead of the default title screen
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Fylcoast/AP_diceydungeons/compare/v0.1.2.1-beta...v0.2.0-beta

entry.title: Minecraft Dig v0.0.6
entry.content:
# What's changed: APWorld v0.0.6
- Trap weights option slider (set 0 to disable) - Temporary Haste and Excavation boost - Added **Progressive Chunks** option to the Yaml (active by default) - Fixed a few minor bugs
### Jar Changelogs - Broken blocks are now counted to the sidebar (its a bit buggy) - Sounds when a layer is dug - Particles when an item is received - The spawn platform is extended and is now cleared from sand and anvils - Block break progression is now persistent and shared, you can also mine the same block together and it will break much faster (coolest feature btw) - The current chunk number is now displayed on the hotbar - Automatic reconnection to the Archipelago server on server restart - Progressive Excavation tier 2 reworked - (I hope) Fixed scaffolding glitch - Fixed wrong chunk number generation

entry.title: Dicey Dungeons v0.2.0
entry.content:
# v0.2.1-beta
Changes from v0.2.0-beta: - Regenerate episode data whenever a location check is sent out, to prevent stale items being populated on successive episode runs
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Fylcoast/AP_diceydungeons/compare/v0.2.0-beta...v0.2.1-beta

entry.title: Spyro 3 v1.3.1
entry.content:
**Note that setup instructions have changed slightly in v1.3.0+. Within Duckstation, navigate to Settings > Game Properties > Console and select "Interpreter" under "Execution Mode".**
This release contains both Client (S3AP.Desktop.exe) and APWorld changes.
New Features: - Full Bundle Gemsanity - Every gem in the game, except for Super Bonus Round, becomes a location. Gem bundles of 50 or 100 per level are added to the item pool. - This adds nearly 4000 locations, of which roughly 200 are progression items. You may wish to modify your filler pool accordingly. - Unless played with other games of a similar size, this is likely to negatively impact placement of the multiworld's progression items and may spam game clients with checks. As a result, the host must approve use of this setting in their host.yaml file.
Bug Fixes: - Fixed a bug where Egg for Sale was not marked as complete in Open World Mode. - Fixed a bug where Universal Tracker was showing Sparx levels as being in logic before the previous one was completed in Open World Mode. - Partially fixed a bug where Molten Crater and Seashell Shores would not open immediately on receiving enough eggs in Open World Mode with Vanilla Level Locks. - If you receive your 10th or 14th egg while in Sunrise Spring Home, you will still need to exit and re-enter the homeworld to enter these levels.

entry.title: Borderlands 2 v63
entry.content:
Want to test on the frontlines? Get the latest developments here. Higher likelihood of showstopping issues. Good luck out there, Slab!
setup instructions on the home page and [readme](https://github.com/EdricY/Bouncy-Loot-God/blob/main/README.md)
[sample yamls](https://github.com/EdricY/Bouncy-Loot-God/tree/main/sample-yamls)

entry.title: Minecraft Dig v0.0.7
entry.content:
Testing new release workflow.
Instructions: https://github.com/jacobmix/Minecraft_AP_Randomizer/blob/master/README.md
# What's changed: APWorld v0.0.7 - Trap weights option slider (set 0 to disable) - Temporary Haste and Excavation boost - Added **Progressive Chunks** option to the Yaml (active by default) - Fixed a few minor bugs
### Jar Changelogs - Broken blocks are now counted to the sidebar (its a bit buggy) - Sounds when a layer is dug - Particles when an item is received - The spawn platform is extended and is now cleared from sand and anvils - Block break progression is now persistent and shared, you can also mine the same block together and it will break much faster (coolest feature btw) - The current chunk number is now displayed on the hotbar - Automatic reconnection to the Archipelago server on server restart - Progressive Excavation tier 2 reworked - (I hope) Fixed scaffolding glitch - Fixed wrong chunk number generation

entry.title: Dark Souls Remastered v0.0.22.1
entry.content:
Release version 0.0.22.1 (Hotfix) * **Hotfix for game crashes and unusable/wrong items due to too many non-local items in DSR** Compatible with v0.0.22.0 multiworlds and generated seeds. entry.title: Touhou Koumakyou ~ the Embodiment of Scarlet Devil v1.4.1
entry.content: - @Eijebong Ensure that every item is only placed in one location - @Eijebong Fix item/location count mismatch with extra stage and no shot type

entry.title: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Perfect Cherry Blossom v1.2.2
entry.content: - @Eijebong Ensure that every item is only placed in one location

entry.title: Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night v1.1.2
entry.content: - @Eijebong Ensure a unique ending treasure is placed in each location - Ending item placement changed to be the same as the other touhou apworld - Fix the command that allow to change the "multiple difficulty check" that wasn't working properly

entry.title: Stardew Valley v7.4.0
entry.content: - New Feature: MultiplayerVision - Enabled from the config file. Defaults to false, until I'm sure it's stable. Then I'll probably make it default to true afterwards - Allows seeing other Stardew players in game - Uses bounce packets for communication. - Frequent packets for positioning (map, pixel, direction, velocity) - Rare packets for player appearance updates (clothes, hair, etc) - No player limit. If you experience lag, feel free to share how many players caused it - Can only see players currently on the same map as you - Cannot interact with other players, only see them - Most animations will not happen (tools, weapons, sleep). Some animations will play (walk, run) - Works between slots, and also when cooping the same slot - The interval for updates, combined with whatever latency you have with the server, will cause some stuttering and rubber banding. I don't think there's a way to avoid this while keeping network usage low, so we have to live with it.

entry.title: Factorio Bob's v2.1.0
entry.content:
The is a smaller update with bugfixes, guide for creating facpack's (allowing custom modpacks) and some stuff @Enderdraak (discord: CosmicWolf) has done
# Changelog: - Fixed `recipe_time` option - Added guide & specification of facpacks's [here](worlds/factorio_bobs/docs/facpack.md) - Hidden items are no longer an option to be put in science packs (bob's voids had this issue) - Added pack name to slot data for UT (this might be all thats needed but UT is untested currently) - Updated Bob's extraction - Added @Enderdraak's Irregular tech tree https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/5943 - Added @Enderdraak's locale changes (nothing forward facing currently but adds the possibility for translations) https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/5908

entry.title: Pokemon Crystal v5.3.10
entry.content:
# Changelog
Since [5.3.9](https://github.com/gerbiljames/Archipelago-Crystal/releases/tag/5.3.9)
## Bug Fixes - Fix Route 33 Headbutt trees providing Route encounters instead of Town encounters - Relax starting town restrictions when dex(count)sanity is enabled, and account for light Rock Tunnel for Lavender start
_This release is backwards compatible with seeds generated on 5.3.9_

entry.title: Jigsaw v0.10.0
entry.content:
# Version 0.10.0 A new version thanks to the amazing work of @djfariel <3 - **_Huge media upgrade_**: GIF support, camera input (including OBS Studio virtual camera), and live YouTube/Twitch browser capture — your puzzle can now be almost anything. - Major engine overhaul: New accelerated WebGL-style renderer, support for up to 2500 pieces, smoother performance, smarter aspect-ratio scaling, and a precision drop-location handle. - Expanded controls & cosmetics: Deep zoom/pan options plus a fully upgraded visual customization panel for board look, rendering, scaling, and more. - See the changelog in-game for all changes.
### Apworld - Not many changes (same yaml), just some extra explanation and added **fariel** to the list of authors.

entry.title: Rimworld v0.5.2b0
entry.content:
## Bugfixes
Removed vacskin glands and blood warmers from the item defs, to prevent more awkward multi-DLC issues.

entry.title: TOEM: A Photo Adventure v2.0.0
entry.content:
Changes:
- Reimplments Cassettes with new ER logic - Added version checks for Client and UT - Adjust min connection window size for lower resolutions - Make ER data more memory efficient - Bugfix: Cassettes locations trigger properly if item is already received - Bugfix: Added logic for raft being fixed with electricity - Bugfix: Basto ticket now properly unlocks house exit
Randomizer details: https://github.com/bbernardoni/Archipelago/blob/toem/worlds/toem/docs/en_TOEM.md Setup guide: https://github.com/bbernardoni/Archipelago/blob/toem/worlds/toem/docs/setup_en.md

entry.title: The Grinch v1.5.0
entry.content:
# Notice Keep in mind that this is a beta release and is not currently ready for a full release. Do not bring this into serious groups unless you know what you are doing. This is for testing purposes only to ensure everything is ready when this update gets a full release. Report bugs and check certain things to make sure everything works as intended.
# Changes - Updated to require AP v0.6.6 to encourage people to update with security patch. - Deathlink! Keep in mind that every area you are able to die in except for Mount Crumpit, Clock Tower, Post Office, & Sleigh Room due to ingame issues I encountered during testing. - Gadgets are now given to you sooner! No longer you are required to use the computer to get the gadget. Just reload/enter a new area to get the gadgets on demand! - Sleigh Parts are now items in the pool! Find them through out the multiworld and enter the sleigh ride with the Sleigh Room Key! Because of this, the sleigh part locations are temporarily removed for the time being. - Grass. - Presents are in the pool aswell. These are items that do nothing to the game if you decide to not want to add rotten eggs to the pool. - Mission completion for squashing all gifts should be removed if you exclude at least one subarea per area. For example if you have `giftsanity` enabled and you have excluded on of Whoville's subareas, the mission will be removed. - Added new `misc_checks` option. Adds various categorized locations in the multiworld. From platforms to killsanity, and other funny locations. - Few new item/location groups
# Bug Fixes - Fixed bug regarding certain locations sending when they should not be. - Elevator in Mount Crumpit should hopefully be positioned in the right level when using the teleport multibind - Various small logic tweaks and fixes that went overlooked.
# Things to do until full release - Fix Heart of Stone locations sometimes not sending - Support for incremental location checks - OR condition addresses for locations - ~~Fix fuzzer errors~~
There are probably many more changes I missed. Look around and see what you can spot!

# Factorio: Space Age apworld v1.0.2

entry.title: Nodebuster v0.1.3
entry.content:
## TL;DR
The main highlight are rules based on upgrade connections to help prevent a lot of upgrades being "reachable" in Sphere 0/1 in UT.
### Changed
* Added save file functionality. * Connecting to a server will check for save files in `user://` with the same seed and player. * Saving will occur more frequently. * Added additional rules for node connections. * Added additional rules to seperate easy milestones from milestones that logically need to be grinded. * Set item classification of `Progressive SpawnRate` from `useful` to `progressive`. * Disabled auto-unlocking upgrade locations, as save files properly save per slot.
### Fixes
* Save created UUID to file in `user://` and load UUID from said file, ensuring UUIDs are reused for future server locking feature.
## What's Changed * Validation: Set Upgrade Nodes to checked "continuous" max level by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/38 * UUID and Save Files in User Folder by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/45
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3

entry.title: UNBEATABLE Arcade v0.2.1a0
entry.content:
This update comes with a fix to generation issues, as well as some much needed QOL features!
APworld changes: - Fixed generation errors where location count did not match item count (thanks to [@gerbiljames](https://github.com/gerbiljames)) - Added a song blacklist option - add any songs you *don't* want to include in the randomizer here. Useful if you don't want to play bookend for 30 minutes or a friend's apworld is too weak to handle Clef's greatness
Client changes: - Added more configuration for death link - you can now separately choose whether or not to trigger deathlink on restarting/quitting a song (thanks to @estradiol-valerate) - Added a notification popup for sending/receiving items (also thanks to @estradiol-valerate) - Notification popups can also be configured in the mod settings!
This release is **compatible** with v0.2.0!
Check [the README](https://github.com/AllPoland/unbeatAP/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions.
The mod and apworld are both still early in development, and are not feature complete nor are there guarantees about stability.
**Please read the YAML options carefully and test your options before joining a lobby**, since the pacing and difficulty of the apworld is very volatile. It's currently very easy to make a randomizer that is way too short or way too long.
Any feedback or ideas are welcome in the "UNBEATABLE (PC)" thread in `#future-game-design` in the [Archipelago Discord](https://discord.gg/8Z65BR2)!

entry.title: Shadow The Hedgehog v0.3.3
entry.content:
This release requires a ton of testing for feasibility.
Known Issues: Craft logic has not been tested in practice. Multiplier in yaml may or may not suit the provided names. Chaos Control Logic not recommended with checkpoint shuffle.
Bug Fixes: Fix option combinations. Reformat yaml order and groups. Add craft logic options. Add ring logic for Circus Park. Fix regional access issues. Fix issues with floating enemies and weapon hold checks. Fix client behaviour with keys. Fix client behaviour with open gates. Change chaos control logic for gate behaviour to ANY. Prevent first-connect release with existing save file. Fix issues with manual/base clear completion. Add standard objective individual autoclear (looking at you MM) Fix issues with craft check not given when clearing. Fix issues with key-sanity less with door logic.

entry.title: Dark Souls II v0.6.0a1
entry.content:
Setup instructions for this release can be found [here](https://github.com/WildBunnie/Archipelago/blob/dark_souls_2/worlds/dark_souls_2/docs/setup_en.md). Info about locations [here](https://github.com/WildBunnie/Archipelago/blob/dark_souls_2/worlds/dark_souls_2/docs/location_en.md), and info about items [here](https://github.com/WildBunnie/Archipelago/blob/dark_souls_2/worlds/dark_souls_2/docs/items_en.md).
Keep in mind that this is an **Alpha** release. It’s a **full rewrite** of both the client and the world. While the core features are in place and working, you should expect that bugs might happen. Please report any bugs in the Discord thread so we can fix them as quickly as possible. Feedback and opinions on the new features are also very much appreciated.
The big change that lead to this rewrite was: **pickups that contain multiple items are no longer a single check.** Now, each item within that pickup counts as its own Archipelago check.
So if you pick up something that gives 5 items, that now results in 5 separate checks instead of just 1.
Because of this change, all locations have updated names as well.
## Changes and New Features
### Archipelago - Multi-item pickups/rewards now grant one Archipelago check per item - New names for all Archipelago locations updated to match the new multi-item system. - Added more location groups (bosses, shops, item categories) - Shops can contain progression items again - Shops that don’t evolve when the NPC is killed are marked as missable - A lot of restrictions of what items can appear in shops have been temporarily lifted to see how it feels. - YAML option for randomized reinforcement levels (weapons & armor) - YAML option to remove armor requirements - Added item bundles (e.g. Arrow x20)
### User Input - New in-game overlay (no more console) - Sending messages (e.g. `!hint`) is not yet implemented, planned before the full release of 0.6.0 - Feedback on the overlay and its settings is greatly appreciated
### Game Modifications - Giant's Kinship and Eye of the Priestess are now randomized - DLC keys are no longer given at character creation in Vanilla - Blowup, barrel, and Ogre breakable walls can now be broken by hitting them - NPC gravestones now spawn instantly and cost 0 to revive (this is to allow the player to buy items even if they kill the NPC) - Majula rotunda now requires the `Rotunda Lockstone` item (can no longer be rotated with souls)
### Technical Stuff - Integrated ds2-modengine (easier file modification and multi-mod support, similar to LazyLoader functionality) - Safeguards to prevent losing an entire batch of items if inventory is full - Archipelago save data now only gets saved when the game saves (helps prevent item loss on crashes)
### Quality of Life - Game finish credits shortened to ~10 seconds
## Not Yet Ported
These features haven’t been moved over yet, but will return before 0.6.0:
- Starter class randomization - Autoequip - DeathLink
## Known Issues - While the giant's kinship and eye of the priestess are randomized and getting them is enough to trigger the events related to them, killing giant lord or interacting with the altar will still trigger the event (we might keep this?)
## Links
- `apworld` code: https://github.com/WildBunnie/Archipelago/commit/412f44aa44168af93efeceb8b4e63f2c11850a14
- `ds2-modengine`: https://github.com/WildBunnie/ds2-modengine/commit/c0ef18882298495314668223930af7a621e85163
- **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WildBunnie/DarkSoulsII-Archipelago/compare/v0.5.5...v0.6.0-alpha.1
## Special Thanks A huge thank you to everyone in the Archipelago Discord server who made this release possible.
A **very special thank you** to **Seeno** for not only helping with a lot of the location names but also playtesting this release with me.

entry.title: Rabi-Ribi v1.4.2
entry.content:
## Quick Links - [Game Info Page](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/blob/main/worlds/rabi_ribi/docs/en_Rabi-Ribi.md) - [Setup Guide](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/blob/main/worlds/rabi_ribi/docs/setup_beta_en.md) - [Known Issues](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3Abug)
## Before Playing This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!
Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.
## What's Changed * Fix Cocoa 1 Region Issue by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/83
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/1.4.5...1.4.6

entry.title: Factorio Bob's v2.1.2
entry.content:
Small update with another facpack from me (which still needs testing, but it generates) This facpack is for Exfret's randomiser which randomises a **lot** more than ap normally but now ap modpacks can by just building off it (A new facpack needs to be created for each Exfret seed, with how Exfret does randomisation only the custom recipes and world setting's forced locations need changing)
Did you know files starting with a full stop get ignored by the ap generator well I didn't until now but it’s now a requirement (although really not enforced) for zipped facpacks to start with one so players is a valid search location for them. Did you also know that you can't add files starting with a full stop to a git release (well I don't really know what to do now)
# Changelog: - the LP engine ("Best" logic) can now cheat in items - I don't really know why this helps but it does so it's staying for now - Fixed an issue when the rocket silo technology: - A. didn't exist - B. wasn't needed for goal - The players folder is now a valid Facpack location - This is meant for a quick and dirty way for hosts to install Facpacks, `factorio modpacks/packs` is still the recommended location - This doesn't change when the yaml folder has been moved (blame host.yaml from not being accessible) - This has also added a (soft) requirements for zipped facpacks to start with a full stop

Well thats annoying

entry.title: PokePark v1.1.3
entry.content:
## What's Changed * fixed can destroy objects overworld logic by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/86 * considering double dash allows dash by @Mekurushi in https://github.com/Mekurushi/Archipelago_Pokepark/pull/87

entry.title: Mario Super Sluggers v0.2.3
entry.content:

Check out the [setup guide](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/Archipelago/blob/sluggers/worlds/mario_super_sluggers/docs/setup_en.md>) for setup procedures. You may also find the [PopTracker pack](<https://github.com/MarioManTAW/MarioSuperSluggersAPTracker/releases>) helpful.

entry.title: Deep Rock Galactic v0.17b0
entry.content:
**Changes (Should be compatible with 0.16+ worlds, but may cause issues)**
Because this is a beta version you must use the .pak file and sideloader until the live release comes to Mod io.
- Added Biomes as location and checks for Kill Caretaker Mode (Does not affect Hunter or Gold Rush) - Added Custom Starting and Ending Biome Options for Kill Caretaker Mode - Added Korlok Tyrant Weed Hunter Mode fix (hopefully) - Completely rewrote region logic - Reorganized options file - Fixed slot name issues - Fixed odd Retrieve Warning
**INFO FILES** [INSTRUCTIONS](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16At-2kS_azJRf9PdUcZeA8Esfoh6kNm2dWVWy8u8wA0/edit?usp=sharing) [MOD on MOD.IO](https://mod.io/g/drg/m/test-archipelago-integration#description) [SIDELOADER for DRG Mods](https://github.com/trumank/mint)

entry.title: Lies Of P v0.1.6
entry.content:
# Changes - DLC ownership detection for Gamepass store version now works - Arche Abbey Outer Wall orange butterfly drop check now sends
## Install Guide [Install Guide](https://github.com/Xtruh/LiesOfAP?tab=readme-ov-file#mod-installation)

entry.title: Dicey Dungeons v0.2.2b0
entry.content:
Changes from v0.2.1-beta: - Items given to Dicey Dungeons from the server (e.g. with /send) should now be considered for Split Dice and Levelsanity options - Underscores ("_") present in AP items will no longer cause Dicey Dungeons to crash on pickup - Episode 2 now follows base game changes: You have innate curse and upgrades are changed to copies - Archipelago world settings (in host.yaml) now leveraged for the install folder, meaning it does not have to be configured each time the client is launched, theoretically just once from a client launch - A new client command /install_folder was added for verifying the configuration - Client command /install_location has been removed - Hints are created when you see AP location checks in a shop/trade
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Fylcoast/AP_diceydungeons/compare/v0.2.1-beta...v0.2.2-beta

entry.title: The Grinch v1.5.0
entry.content:
# Notice Keep in mind that this is a beta release and is not currently ready for a full release. Do not bring this into serious groups unless you know what you are doing. This is for testing purposes only to ensure everything is ready when this update gets a full release. Report bugs and check certain things to make sure everything works as intended.
# Bug Fixes - Fixed major logic bug for the Sleigh Ride region using the old logic and not the sleigh parts

entry.title: Nine Sols v0.4.5
entry.content:
For installation instructions [see the README](https://github.com/Ixrec/NineSolsArchipelagoRandomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#installation).
0.4.4 and 0.4.5 are both bugfix releases. Broadly speaking, 0.4.4 focused on "quick and easy" fixes (especially the long list of logic issue reports). 0.4.5 instead focuses on deeper, more fundamental improvements for long-term stability, which also come with more risk.
- Stability & Bug Mitigation - The AP server connection will now be closed every time you quit to the main menu, which should resolve or mitigate a wide range of issues (e.g. sending death links from Battle Memories mode). In particular, this makes it easy to force a reconnect after a network outage, allowing the mod to recover by resending any locations and re-receiving any items that may have been missed during the outage. - When the mod receives several messages "at the same time", it will no longer print every individual message to the screen. Instead you will see a single message like `Received 300 messages within 100 ms. Pause to read them.` Hopefully this will improve general game stability, because Unity doesn't seem to like it when I update the UI hundreds of times a second. - If Yi is somehow missing a core movement ability that we've already received the AP item for (after loading a save file), the mod will now "re-apply" the missing ability and display a warning. This should mitigate various unreproducible glitches, but if you find a way to consistently trigger these warnings please report it so we can fix the underlying bug. - Minimize the chances of 'seed bleed' bugs by making the code around slot_data application more consistent. - Added explicit exception handling to all of the mod code that runs on level loads/transitions. This should prevent any future bugs in these codepaths from softlocking the entire game with "endless loading screens" (like the jade cost issue 0.4.4 fixed). - Logic issues - Added more regions around GoS (West)'s "spike ball chase", partly to resolve some confusion around what the existing logic intended, but also to fix a logic bug where the GoS (West) spawn would expect you to reach the "Below Western Cliffs" location without the movement items to survive the spike ball chase. - Since 0.4.3 added the `prevent_weakened_prison_state` option, "Prison: Lower Left Cell" has incorrectly been in logic without nymph. This has been fixed. - The `ledge_storage` logic for "GoS (West): Above Elevator" was incorrectly marked as `medium`. This has been fixed. - Universal Tracker - The "world_map" map page now uses a much cleaner background image (thanks XDrotkon). - AP region names have been changed to use the same area prefixes as AP location names. For example: "EDLA - Opera Theater" is now "ED (Living Area) - Opera Theater", which makes it more consistent with the location name "ED (Living Area): Fuxi's Vital Sanctum". This mainly affects the output of the `/explain` and `/get_logical_path` commands. - The Universal Tracker support now accounts for prevent_annoying_runbacks, shuffle_grapple, shuffle_wall_climb and shuffle_ledge_grab. The shuffle* options don't change logic, but their absence was causing `/next_progression` to never check these items. - This won't affect most of you for a while yet, but on AP 0.6.7 (whenever that comes out), nine_sols.apworld will start using "rule builder" internally. This effectively upgrades UT's `/explain` command, replacing the usual `doesn't have a rule that supports explanation` part of its output with a proper color-coded explanation of the logic rule. - The example .yaml's minimum AP version is now 0.6.4. This has been the .apworld's minimum for a while; I just forgot to update the .yaml.

entry.title: Everhood 2 v0.3.2
entry.content:
> [!IMPORTANT] > **Doorsanity Off is BROKEN in Act 2**. It is missing some crucial changes like opening up Lab/Smega/Human City after defeating dragon, and allowing you to retry Everhood 1
> [!IMPORTANT] > While many softlocks have been fixed. Some softlocks may still occur. Some areas were untested such as Red Route, many Hilbert Hotel rooms and Green Route 3. Please bring my attention to them in Discord if they occur.
# Changes: - Act 2 has been implemented. This is anything connected to the second hub. - Added Save after Battle. Any Battle that properly ends will now save as you get into the world. - Many cases where teleporting back to hub causing various errors have been fixed.
# Still to come: - Requiring multiple sources of a colour in act 2. (That is need 2 Red items to refect Red colours in Act 2.) - Fixing Doorsanity Off. - Double checking the unlock condition of Green Route 4. I believe it is actually available in Act 2 but currently not implemented. - Turning off the Elevator Code entry. Elevator Codes are to be locked behind Act 3. - Ensuring all cases of settings work without errors.
# Installation ### Melonloader *Melonloader is required to play with this mod. However reinstalling it is not required on update.*
1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it. 2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `Everhood 2.exe`. - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*. - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder. 3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.** 4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.
### Mod Install
1.Download `ArchipelagoEverhood.zip`. 2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`. 3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods. - Ensure that `ArchipelagoEverhood.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder. 4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.

entry.title: Slay the Spire v2.3.2
entry.content:
2.3.2 patch release of the StS APWorld. This AP world requires a 2.x release of the mod from https://github.com/cjmang/Slay-The-Spire-Archipelago-Mod/releases.
### Changes 1. Fixed a logic issue where on A20, you could be locked out of checks with ascension downs. This could be especially bad if running with key sanity. Reaching the Act 3 boss room now logically requires the keys. 2. Floor 56 now only exists logically if running A20 with no ascension downs. 3. Reordered some of the options in the yaml. No impact to old YAMLs.
For all AP releases you will need to install the spire.apworld file into your Archipelago installation's custom_worlds folder. You can find said apworld in the assets of this release.
For the setup guide, please go to https://github.com/cjmang/StS-AP-World/blob/sts/worlds/spire/docs/slay-the-spire_en.md.

entry.title: TOEM: A Photo Adventure v2.0.0

Changes:
- Client version check now allows any patch version (aka, the 2.0.1 will work on any apworld with version 2.0.x) - Bugfix: Basto disabled option works again (was giving key error on gen) - Bugfix: Fixed bad entrance logic when progressive stamps are off
Randomizer details: https://github.com/bbernardoni/Archipelago/blob/toem/worlds/toem/docs/en_TOEM.md Setup guide: https://github.com/bbernardoni/Archipelago/blob/toem/worlds/toem/docs/setup_en.md
